alert.note: Alert for Caroline; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Western Hanover; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 14 at 8:19PM EST until January 16 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT EST MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 3 inches. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Virginia. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to midnight EST Monday night. The heaviest snowfall is expected from late morning through early evening Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.

area.areaDesc: Caroline; Eastern Louisa; Fluvanna; Goochland; Western Hanover; Western Louisa
